abstract: The company posted a statement in its Twitter feed that asked the governor of Arkansas, its home state, to reject legislation that critics say could allow discrimination against lesbians and gay men.
snippet: The company posted a statement in its Twitter feed that asked the governor of Arkansas, its home state, to reject legislation that critics say could allow discrimination against lesbians and gay men.
lead_paragraph: Walmart, which has deployed its financial might to squeeze extra gallons of gas out of its trucks and shave pennies off the price of laundry detergent, did something unexpected this week: It muscled its way into a divisive social debate.

headline.main: Walmart Emerges as Unlikely Social Force
headline.print_headline: Walmart Emerges as Unlikely Social Force

byline.original: By Hiroko Tabuchi and Michael Barbaro
